name: YTLite
subtitle: Unofficial source of YTLite
description: The unofficial AltStore source of the YouTube tweak, YTLite. YTLite is a flexible enhancer for YouTube on iOS, featuring over hundred customizable options.

apps.name: YTLite
apps.subtitle: A flexible enhancer for YouTube on iOS
apps.localizedDescription: A flexible enhancer for YouTube on iOS, featuring over hundred customizable options.

versions.localizedDescription:
- This update is primarily focused on improving stability and fixing major and critical bugs.
- Introduced SponsorBlock Engine to handle sponsorblock api, sponsor segments and video interaction
- Added the ability to whitelist channels (SponsorBlock) and manage the list
- Added support for creating, saving, and editing private and public SponsorBlock UserIDs (more features coming soon)
- Reworked the player gesture toast, with a new compact mode
- Rewritten progress toast with support for swipe-to-dismiss gestures, also now used by SponsorBlock
- Added ability to open clipboard links (Long-press on the first tab → Open Link)
- Added an option to automatically check and open clipboard for any YouTube-related links (YTPlus Settings → Interface → Other)
- Fixed an issue where post images couldn’t be opened by tapping
- Fixed crashes while scrolling through the feed
- Fixed rare crashes during video playback
- Fixed crashes with Speed Controls in the player overlay
- Speed Controls interaction now resets the overlay auto-hide timer
- Fixed playback rate changing up to 5x, both, overlay controls and gestures
- Fixed issues related to hiding menu buttons
- Fixed overlay buttons not hiding correctly in Shorts
- Fixed tab bar issues
- Fixed minor bugs in the feed
- Improved gesture interaction within the player
- Fixed general overlay interaction issues
- Partially rewritten YTPlus settings for better stability and UX. Replaced oversized YT Sheets with compact menus, tapping a cell now shows a detailed alert
- Various minor internal code improvements and cleanups

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: YTLite requires access to your Apple Music library.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YTLite requires Bluetooth access to connect with nearby peripherals.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: YTLite requires access to the camera to capture photos and videos.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: YTLite requires access to your contacts to help you share content with your friends.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: YTLite requires local network access to connect and communicate with nearby devices.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: YTLite requires access to your location while using the app to provide personalized recommendations.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: YTLite requires access to your microphone to record audio.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: YTLite requires access to your Photo Library to save photos and videos.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: To personalize ads and provide ad measurement, YTLite will link activity from this app with activity from non-Google apps and websites.
